name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Grasp the shard tightly to enrich yourself with crystalline energy, increasing your Mastery by 6,204 for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: The shard draws in remnant energy from defeated enemies, increasing your Mastery by 131 for 15 sec, up to 5 times.

Equip: Casting a major class cooldown imbues you with the ferocity of vrykul spirits, granting 2,951 Critical Strike for 8 sec.

This effect's duration is increased by up to 40 sec based on when you were last imbued.

Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have the chance to ignite your target with Radiant Focus for 15 sec. 

After dealing up to 1.9 million damage to the target, the focused energies ignite you with Radiance, granting between 391 to 782 of your highest Secondary stat based on damage dealt for 15 sec.
